arts.ttl: Lazio Could Miss Out on Another Target as Southampton Submit Offer
arts.sum: Southampton have reportedly made a concrete offer for RC Strasbourg defender Abakar Sylla who has been on top of Lazio’s shortlist. The Background In addition to their quest to sign a new midfielder, the Biancocelesti are also in the market for a new centre-back, with Sylla emerging as their primary candidate as of late. The […] The post Lazio Could Miss Out on Another Target as Southampton Submit Offer appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: Ivan Juric not giving up hope of keeping Southampton in Premier League
arts.sum: Southampton remain bottom of the Premier League, but have moved onto nine points.

arts.ttl: Ipswich 1-2 Southampton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Arijanet Muric gifts Saints victory
arts.sum: Arijanet Muric endures another nightmare afternoon in goal as Ipswich Town suffer a shock 2-1 loss to Premier League basement boys Southampton at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Southampton revive survival hopes after Paul Onuachu’s winner at Ipswich
arts.sum: Saints claimed a first Premier League win in four months but remain bottom of the table.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth v Liverpool, Newcastle v Fulham, and more: football – live
arts.sum: Updates from the Premier League and further afield

arts.ttl: Club walk away from Southampton player despite his ‘real desire’ for transfer – Operation ‘too complicated to finalise’
arts.sum: Last summer, Southampton’s Kamaldeen Sulemana came close to joining Ajax before the move collapsed. Russell Martin didn’t include the winger in his core plans and limited him to 70 minutes from seven games. On December 21st, Southampton replaced Martin with Ivan Jurić and the winger featured regularly, managing a goal and an assist from 286 The post Club walk away from Southampton player despite his ‘real desire’ for transfer – Operation ‘too complicated to finalise’ appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Ipswich vs Southampton: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Previewing Ipswich vs Southampton in the Premier League, including team news, predictions and how to watch on TV.

arts.ttl: Champions League Giant Want ‘Special’ Southampton Star, He Could Push to Leave
arts.sum: Southampton's rising star will likely be on the move next summer and one of the Champions League's most successful clubs want him.

arts.ttl: Ipswich winger Burns to miss rest of season with torn ACL
arts.sum: Ipswich winger Wes Burns is out for the rest of the season after suffering a torn anterior cruciate ligament during last weekend's defeat at Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Southampton boss makes new Cameron Archer transfer admission amid Leeds United pursuit
arts.sum: And now Juric says he believes Archer - his club’s top scorer with five goals in 25 matches - will stay at St Mary's beyond transfer deadline day. Leeds boss Daniel Farke has kept the door open for a striker arrival in the final days of the window with Patrick Bamford still sidelined with a hamstring injury and United otherwise being one injury away from having only one fit centre-forward.
